enhanced_by.reason: The intersectionArea method relies on the intersects method to determine if there is an intersection before calculating the area.
Both intersectionArea and area methods calculate areas, making area a good candidate for assertions related to intersectionArea.

enhanced_by.method_name: GeometryUtil.intersects(double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double)
enhanced_by.reason: The intersects method in GeometryUtil performs a similar intersection check, which can inform the assertions for intersectionArea.
